steps.1: Cut-Cut 1/4 block or 3 ounces of fresh tofu into large cubes (about 1 in x 1 in)
steps.2: Turn-Turn on the heat to medium
steps.3: drizzle-drizzle 1 tablespoon soy sauce (watch for spitting) on the pan
steps.4: drizzle-drizzle with the 1 tablespoons sesame oil on the pan
steps.5: add-add the tofu cubes to the pan
steps.6: remove-Briefly remove the pan from the heat to reduce spitting
steps.8: remove-Briefly remove from the heat again
steps.12: add-add 1/4 tsp salt to the pan
steps.14: cook-cook pan for 2 minutes until the colour is darkened
steps.17: Add-Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a non-stick pan
steps.18: Cook-Cook 5 to 6 minutes until tofu cubes are lightly browned on the bottom
steps.19: pat-pat tofu dry with a towel
